io.jeo.raster

Interface Band


  • public interface Band
    A band or component of a raster dataset.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Band.Color
      Enumeration for color interpretation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Band.Color color()
      The color interpretation of the band.
      DataType datatype()
      Returns the numeric type of data stored in the band.
      String name()
      The name of the band.
      Double nodata()
      The nodata value of the band.
      Stats stats()
      Computes statistics of the band.

    • Method Detail

      • name

        String name()
        The name of the band.

      • datatype

        Returns the numeric type of data stored in the band.

      • color

        Band.Color color()
        The color interpretation of the band.

      • nodata

        Double nodata()
        The nodata value of the band.
        Returns:
        The value or null if the band has no nodata value.

      • stats

        Stats stats()
            throws IOException
        Computes statistics of the band.
        Returns:
        The object containing the statistics.
        Throws:
        IOException
